alert.note: Alert for Christian; Logan; Macon; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Logan, north central Christian, northeastern Sangamon, southwestern De Witt and western Macon Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Latham, or 14 miles northwest of Decatur, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warrensburg around 430 PM CDT. Chestnut around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kenney. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 114 and 123. Interstate 72 between mile markers 113 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
